Type.Name: TreeViewMappingFunc

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void TreeViewMappingFunc(TreeView tree_view, TreePath path);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: A delegate to specify the signature of a function to be called on a set of rows that are expanded.
Docs.remarks: See for when and how a function of this shape gets called.
